title: (x) de blauwe peer - ITC Goudy Sans {Mark S}
author: trama

comments.content: [ITC Goudy Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017074203/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-goudy-sans/black-italic/testdrive.html?s=de%a0blauwe%a0peer&p=48), I think. Yes, definitely. Black Italic, to be exact.
Hehe, graphic design studio from the neighbourhood. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017074203im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
